Device.description: A storage device, such as a disk drive or optical media device.
Device.longDescription: This type shall describe a storage device visible to simple storage.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Manufacturer.description: The name of the manufacturer of this device.
Manufacturer.longDescription: This property shall indicate the name of the manufacturer of this storage device.

Model.description: The product model number of this device.
Model.longDescription: This property shall indicate the model information as provided by the manufacturer of this storage device.

Name.description: The name of the Resource or array member.
Name.longDescription: This object represents the name of this Resource or array member.  The Resource values shall comply with the Redfish Specification-described requirements.  This string value shall be of the 'Name' reserved word format.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties contained in this object shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

Status.description: The status and health of the Resource and its subordinate or dependent Resources.
Status.longDescription: This property shall contain any status or health properties of the Resource.

SimpleStorage.description: The SimpleStorage schema represents the properties of a storage controller and its directly-attached devices.
SimpleStorage.longDescription: This Resource contains a storage controller and its directly-attached devices.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Devices.longDescription: This property shall contain a list of storage devices related to this Resource.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties that this object contains shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

Status.description: The status and health of the Resource and its subordinate or dependent Resources.
Status.longDescription: This property shall contain any status or health properties of the Resource.

UefiDevicePath.description: The UEFI device path to access this storage controller.
UefiDevicePath.longDescription: This property shall contain the UEFI device path that identifies and locates the specific storage controller.

title: #SimpleStorage.v1_0_8.SimpleStorage
